title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Work with Python, SQL and pandas to clean and analyze datasets. Build dashboards and present insights. Prefer candidates with basic statistics and data visualization (Matplotlib/Plotly).

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Assist in training and evaluating ML models. Knowledge of scikit-learn, basic deep learning, and data preprocessing required. Good understanding of Python and Jupyter notebooks.

title: Backend Developer (Junior)
description: Build and maintain backend services in Python (FastAPI/Flask). Experience with REST APIs, SQL databases, and unit testing. Familiarity with Docker is a plus.

title: Data Engineer - Entry Level
description: Design ETL pipelines, manage data warehouses, and optimize SQL queries. Exposure to cloud platforms (GCP/AWS) and Python preferred.

title: Business Analyst Intern
description: Gather requirements, analyze KPIs, and create reports. Basics of Excel, SQL and stakeholder communication helpful. Opportunity to learn product analytics.
